text: Bey karısına yakışmayan bir kadından çok fazla şey istersiniz.
english: Sir, you expect too much from a woman who is not worthy of his wife .

text: Gökçe; o, Ertuğrul'un âşık olduğu kadın.
english: Gokce; She is the woman Ertuğrul is in love with.

text: Bu, kıyamete kadar da böyle olacak.
english: This will remain the case until the end of time.
(Hayme's inner voice) Oh my lord, oh...
...I wish you were alive and by my side.

text: (Hayme iç ses) Sana o kadar ihtiyacım var ki.
english: (Hayme's inner voice) I need you so much.
n't sleep, sir. I didn't get to
say much while I was with Geyikli.
How are things in the village?
They ask, "What will happen next?" The

text: Ok, yaydan bir kere çıktı kardeşlerim.
english: arrow has left the bow, my brothers.
There's no turning back from this.

text: Lakin hiçbir şey eskisi gibi olmayacaktır.
english: But nothing will ever be the same again.

openly threatens us. I would rather tolerate the banditry

text: Moğol zalimine dur demeden, eşkıyalıklarına müsaade ederim.

What are we going to do in a short time, sir?
Tomorrow, perhaps for the last time... we will
go to the camp and kidnap Abdurrahman. We'll
many destructions have there been now?
(Hamza) How many suicides has the tribe had to endure? Just

text: Düşünün hele kardeşlerim; bit kadar boyumuzla...
english: think about it, my brothers and sisters; With our tiny stature... we dared to defy the

text: ...Eyyubi Hanedanlığına kafa tuttuk da ne oldu ha?
english: Ayyubid Dynasty, and what happened, huh?
You tell me, clumsy one. Didn't

text: Ana kuzusu iki kardeşin ölmedi mi?
english: your two innocent brothers die? He's

text: Yiğit Alp babanla Alp kardeşini kendi ellerinle vermedin mi toprağa?
english: Yiğit Alp, bury your father and your brother Alp with your own hands?

text: (Hamza) O vakit nedendir ha? Niye, söyleyin bana.
english: (Hamza) Then why is that? Why, tell me. So that

text: Gündoğdu Bey'le Ertuğrul Bey yiğitliklerine yiğitlik...
english: Gündoğdu Bey and Ertuğrul Bey may add to their bravery and

text: ...kız almak için Haçlı kefereleriyle yaptığınız savaşları hatırlayın.
english: Remember the wars you fought with the Crusader infidels to take a girl from the Seljuk Palace...
Why? So that they may add to their lineage...
...so that they may grow up and become powerful. How many times did

text: Ertuğrul Bey baş Alp olup, hepimizi kaç kez cenk meydanına soktu?
english: Ertuğrul Bey, as the chief Alp, lead us all into battle? Is there anyone

text: İçinizde canı yanmayan var mıdır? Ocağına ateş düşmeyen var mıdır?
english: among you who isn't hurting? Is there anyone whose hearth hasn't been set ablaze?
But we protected our property and our honor. Not

text: Sadece kendimizin değil, tüm İslam aleminin.
english: just for ourselves, but for the entire Islamic world.

text: (Hamza) Lakin koruduk da ne oldu? Şimdi neredeyiz?
english: (Hamza) But what good did it do us to protect them? Where are we now? Facing the

text: Cihanın gördüğü en büyük ordunun karşısında...
english: greatest army the world has ever seen ...

text: Kuru bir şöhretimiz var. Lakin kuru bir ekmeğimiz bile yoktur yemeye.
english: have a reputation that's only worth something. But we don't even have a piece of dry bread to eat. We ended up being the

text: Elin obasının şamar oğlanı olup çıktık.
(Hamza) Niye? Gündoğdu Bey'imiz öyle uygun gördüğü için.
english: (Hamza) Why? Because Mr. Gündoğdu deemed it appropriate. Instead of the

text: İki kardeş bir olacağına, obanın ahalisi gözü önünde...
english: two brothers uniting, they fight in front of the whole village... Did
they leave any traditions behind in Obada?

text: Siz ki bu alemin gördüğü en iyi savaşçılarsınız.
english: You are the best warriors this world has ever seen .

text: (Hamza) Namınızı Cengiz Han'ın oğlu Ögeday dahi duymuştur.
english: (Hamza) Even Ögeday, the son of Genghis Khan, has heard of you.

text: Sizlere ömrünüzde göremeyeceğiniz kadar çok altın göndermiştir.
english: He has sent you more gold than you could ever see in your lifetime.

text: ...yarın sabaha dek iyice bir düşünün hele.
english: ...think about it carefully until tomorrow morning.
...the valiant Alpines who dare to come with me ...

text: ...çil çil altınlarını alıp, gerçek bir savaşçının nasıl olacağını...

english: ...showing the whole world what a true warrior is like.

text: Tek bir kelam bile etme kadın.
Ne kadar haklı sözler ettiğimi işitmek bu kadar mı gururunu örseler?
english: hearing how right I am really hurt your pride so much?

text: Bunca zamandır omuz omuza savaştığın kardeşine değil...
english: Instead of fighting alongside your brother all this time, you've fallen for that

text: ...o yosmanın sözüne kapılan dayınla Tuğtekin budalasının kuyruğuna takıldın.
english: hussy's words and followed your uncle and that fool Tuğtekin. This was

text: Kardeşin sana ömründe ilk kez el kaldırdı.
english: Your brother raised his hand against you for the first time in his life. Do

text: Neden bilir misin Gündoğdu'm? Senin yüzünden.
english: you know why, Gündoğdu? Because of you.
If you say one more word... will

text: Vuracak mısın? Ben, sen gerçekleri görene kadar susmayacağım.
english: you shoot me? I will not be silent until you see the truth.

text: Ucunda ölüm de olsa susmayacağım. Anlasana Gündoğdu'm, anan da sen de...
english: I will not remain silent, even if it means death. Understand, Gündoğdu, both you and your mother...
...made a huge mistake by turning your backs on Ertuğrul .
That wicked woman will not rest until she has spilled the blood of the mother...

text: ...sonra da Ertuğrul'un kanına girmeden rahat etmeyecek.
Aç artık şu kör gözlerin. Böyle köşeye sinerek...
english: Open your blind eyes now. Hiding in a corner like this...

text: ...böyle kaçarak, içine girdiğimiz beladan kurtulamayacaksın, anlasana!
english: ...and running away like this, you won't escape the trouble we've gotten ourselves into, understand? Leave her

text: Biz zamanlar ikimizin de içini kemiren ihtiraslardan korkup durursun.
english: times when you were afraid of the passions that gnawed at both of us.

text: Lakin şunu unutma Gündoğdu; bizim ihtiraslarımızın bin beteri onlarda var.
english: But don't forget this, Gündoğdu; They have ambitions a thousand times worse than ours.

text: Marazlısın kadın sen. Senin aklın marazlı.
english: sick, woman. Your mind is disturbed.

text: Bana bunları yaptırdın ya, Allah versin senin cezanı.
english: You made me do these things, may God punish you.
Get your filthy hands off me!

text: Er ya da geç hepinizin ne mal olduğu çıkacak ortaya.
english: Sooner or later, your true selves will be revealed. It

text: Allah senin aşkın olmadan bir gün bile yaşatmasın beni.
english: God never let me live even a single day without your love. May
God never separate us, my brave one.
...It is forbidden for me to breathe without your presence.
I miss him so much, my dear.
My sister Aykız has become a martyr. He is

text: İnşallah sen de vuslata ereceksin Turgut Alp.
english: Hopefully you will also be reunited with your beloved, Turgut Alp.

text: ...senin uğrunda şehit olmayı bana nasip eyle.
english: ... grant me the grace to become a martyr in Your cause . O

text: Şahadet şerbetini içmeyi bana nasip eyle yarabbim.
english: Lord, grant me the grace to drink the cup of martyrdom.
... we will get our revenge on that bastard Noyan. May we never live until we have taken

text: O soysuz köpekten intikamımızı almadan yaşamak bize haram olsun.
english: our revenge on that vile dog .

text: Bekle beni soysuz köpek. Ecelin elimden olacak.
english: Wait for me, you vile dog. Your death will be at my hands.

text: Sen ne söylersin kızım? Oğlum asla sana el kaldırmaz.
english: What do you say, my daughter? My son would never lay a hand on you.

text: Ben onun taşımak zorunda olduğu uğursuz, irinli bir yarayım ana.
english: I am a sinister, festering wound that she has to carry, Mother.
(Selcan) Don't you know? When I pressed her further, she took

text: Üstüne de gidince Ertuğrul'a öfkesini benden çıkarttı.

english: Mom, I'll take care of Selcan. Come. Ok

text: Tamam. Hadi kalk annem. Hadi yavrum.
english: . Come on, get up, Mom. Come on, my dear.
Your father is aware of everything, too. The
greatest supporter of the principality you will establish...

text: ...Gündoğdu olacak. Ne halan, ne de bir başkası.
english: ...will be Gündoğdu. Neither your aunt, nor anyone else.
What's going through your mind, Mom?
He's a lonely, unhappy man. A man with a

text: Döşeği soğuk, beşiği boş, yüreği yılgın bir erkek.
english: cold bed, an empty cradle, and a weary heart. He sees himself decaying and wasting away from the

Üvey anasının emrinde, babasının göz bebeği Ertuğrul'un gölgesinde...

Then we will have a homeland. And what if

text: Goncagül, Gündoğdu'nun buz gibi soğuk döşeğini de...

...that will be a celebration for everyone, Tuğtekin.

text: Ne diyorsun sen? Nasıl oldu bu?
english: What are you talking about? How did this happen?

text: Lakin avradını elinden zor aldım beyim.

text: Ona destek ol. Ona yol göster.

text: Ölene kadar bedelini ödetecek Allah bana.
english: God will make me pay the price until I die. My deeds will haunt

english: I pray to my Lord every day, but... Don't

But it's too late now, Halime.

text: Senin rızanla içimdeki iktidar hırsından kurtuldum.
english: consent, I freed myself from the lust for power within me.

text: İnsanın ruhunu yiyen kibir putundan kurtuldum.
english: I have freed myself from the idol of pride that devours the human soul.

text: Lakin babamın otağının yükü hâlâ omuzlarımdadır.
english: But the burden of my father's tent still rests on my shoulders.

text: Bana o yükü taşıma gücü ver.
english: Give me the strength to carry that burden.
I don't know what to do about Selcan.

text: Bana Selcan için de yol göster.
english: Give me directions for Selcan as well.
Your power is sufficient for everything.
I seek refuge in You from my shortcomings... my weaknesses.

text: İkimiz de obaların geleceğini sırtladık abi. Bundan kaçamayız.
english: both shouldered the responsibility for the future of our tribes, brother. We can't escape this.

text: Ancak birbirimize destek olursak obalarımızı düzlüğe çıkartırız.
english: But only by supporting each other can we bring our settlements to prosperity.

text: Lakin senin çadırında huzurlu olman gerek abi.
english: But you need to be at peace in your tent, brother.

text: Eğer huzurun yoksa, atının eyerinin üstünde de huzur bulamazsın.
english: If you have no peace, you cannot find peace even in the saddle of your horse.

text: Ve senin bir evlat sahibi olman gerektir abi.
english: And you need to have a child, brother.

text: Tıpkı benim de bir an evvel bir avrat bulup, evlenmem gerektiği gibi.
english: Just like I need to find a wife and get married as soon as possible.

text: Rahmetli eşin yine rüyana mı girdi bey?
english: late wife appear in your dreams again, husband?
Aytolun never came out. It never came out.
Since the day we got married...

text: ...ne de huzurla uyanıp yeni bir güne başladım.

That night at the dinner table...

text: Hangi gece? Ne oldu o gece?
english: Which night? What happened that night? The night
died in my son's arms. Oh

Say, "Let me be your cure." I couldn't tell
...we were the only two at the dinner table the night she died. She
looked at me and said your name, Aytolun. The last words he uttered

Looking me in the eyes, he

...and flirted with you in the caravanserais.
She said so," I said to the woman. Understand!

text: Sonra gözlerime acıyarak bakarak bana ne dedi biliyor musun?
english: Then, looking at me with pity in her eyes, do you know what she said to me? "I am keeping quiet

text: Lakin o kadını bir daha görmeye gidersen...

Then he said your name. Aytolun. There was more pity than anger in

english: for sleeping with you . She seemed to feel sorry for

text: Tam yemeğinden bir lokma daha alacaktı ki...
english: one more bite of his meal when ...
he died in my son's arms...

text: ...seninle benim aramda olan her şeyi biliyordu.
english: ... he knew everything that had happened between you and me.

text: Bu uyku daha ne kadar sürecek Ertuğrul?
english: How much longer will this sleep last, Ertuğrul?
When will you pursue your duty?

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Bu uyku daha ne kadar sürecek Ertuğrul?
english: (Ibn-i Arabi's voiceover) How much longer will this sleep last, Ertuğrul?

text: Sizler gerçek kahramanlarsınız. Buraya gelerek bunu gösterdiniz.
english: You are the real heroes. You demonstrated this by coming here.

text: Kendi Alplerine bile sahip çıkamayan bey müsveddelerinin elinden...

english: You will rescue the women and children of the Kayı tribe from the hands of those wretched men who can't even protect their own Alps.

text: Kargın anlatmıştır. Ögeday, Konya ile yetinmeyecek.
english: Kargin narrated it. Ögeday will not be content with just Konya. He

english: Then it will advance deep into Europe.

text: Şimdi bu zenginlikten nasibini alacak savaşçılar mı olmak istersiniz...

english: ...or wretched souls who dare to challenge the greatest army the world has ever seen ? What about

english: Noyan said, "Their lives are my lives."
...by coming here, you've shown that you are true warriors.

text: Lakin çok daha fazlası için savaşacaklar...
english: But they will fight for much more...
...let him come with me. I am here to show the

text: Yapamam. Süleyman Şah'ıma, onun şerefli obasına ve töremize ihanet edemem.
english: . I cannot betray my Suleyman Shah, his honorable tribe, and our traditions.

text: Cihanın gördüğü en büyük ordu bizi bekler Alpler. Hadi ya Allah.

text: Tüccar ve iş yaptığı bütün adamlar öldü.
english: The merchant and all the men he did business with were dead.

text: Gündoğdu, hayvanlarını ve kilimhanedeki değerli mallarını satamayacak.

text: Uzun ve soğuk kış günlerinde, bakalım ekmeklerini ne kadar bölüşecekler.
english: During the long and cold winter days, let 's see how much of their bread they will share.
I sent a message. It will arrive soon.

text: Şu sefil hayatta en zevk aldığım şey savaşmak.
english: In this wretched life, the thing I enjoy most is fighting.

text: Lakin daha çok zevk aldığım şey nedir bilir misin Tangut?
english: But do you know what I enjoy even more, Tangut?
Kayı tribe and the Dodurga tribe…
will fall into my lap one by one, like ripe plums.
I admire your taste, Baycu Noyan.

…until that ominous head falls to the ground…

God not allow brother to turn against brother

…will grow in the heart of the world, becoming an ocean.

text: Her kim ki düşer ikiliğin çıkmaz yollarına…

…shrinks in the bosom of the world, and becomes disgraced and humiliated. May Almighty

those who say "Amen, amen" behold the divine countenance. May
Almighty God forgive our sins. Hey lady

text: Git kilimhaneden karını al gel. Hadi.
english: Go and get your wife from the carpet factory. Come on .
I can't be with Selcan, Mom.
She blames me for our fight with Ertuğrul.
You raised your hand for him, huh? That
I know. That's unbecoming of a man.
son, you are a nobleman's son. If

english: you act like this, what will the people do? Ha?

text: Hadi git şimdi karını al gel. Hadi.
english: Go now and bring your wife here. Come on .
Until this cursed war is over…
… I will send him and his Alps into exile if necessary.
Hopefully things won't come to that.
You should keep your eyes wide open too.

text: Dayının otağından gelecek yanlışlara müsaade etme.
english: Do not allow any wrongdoings to come from your uncle's tent. Do

english: Come on, get up now. The poor girl has been devastated since last night.

text: Artık onun hakkında da kararını ver.
english: Now you should make your decision about him too.

text: Böyle gönül kırmakla hiçbir şey halledemezsin.
english: You can't solve anything by breaking people's hearts like this. You're
right, main lesson. Here you go
My lord, Geyikli is still not there.

text: Moğollardan haber getirmeye gitti dedim size.
english: I told you he went to get news from the Mongols.
From whom and where will he bring the news, sir?

text: O, bu dağların kurdudur. Merak etmeyesin.
english: He is the wolf of these mountains. Do n't worry.
Come on, get up, Turgut Alp.
I told you to get up.

text: Bu el daha pusat tutacak hâle gelmemiştir.
english: This hand is not yet capable of holding a weapon.

text: İyi de orada durup seyredecek misin?
english: So are you just going to stand there and watch?

text: Yoksa gelip bana yardım edecek misin?
english: Or are you going to come and help me?

text: Ne yaptığımı merak ediyorsun değil mi?
english: You're wondering what I've been doing, are n't you? I am making

text: Kılıcını eskiden tuttuğu gibi sımsıkı tutabilsin diye.
english: he could hold his sword as tightly as he used to. So that those who shed the blood of Aykız,
her mother, and her father, may be held accountable

text: Hepsine birer mezar kazıp gömdük beyim. Bu yüzden geç kaldık.
english: dug graves for each of them and buried them, sir. That's why we were late. I'm

text: Belli ki attığımız her adımdan haberleri var.
english: Clearly, they know about every step we take.

text: Yoksa o zavallı adamcağızı neden öldürsünler ki?
english: Otherwise, why would they kill that poor man?

text: Belli ki bizi kışın aç biilaç bırakmak isterler.
english: Clearly, they want to leave us hungry and destitute in the winter .

text: Bu iş sandığımızdan da zor olacak abi.
english: This job is going to be harder than we thought, man.
It will happen, it will happen

text: …lakin benim kafama takılan başka bir soru var.
english: ... but there's another question that's bothering me.

text: Noyan belli ki bu kış durmayacak.
english: Noyan clearly wo n't stop this winter.
… how much of their bread will the people of Dodurga share with us?
You can't do your job properly. Ca n't you see?

text: Var git çadırına da dinlen biraz.
english: Go to your tent and rest a little.
I'll do it again now. Leave

text: Gündoğdu Bey’in öfkesi belli ki çok sarsmış seni.
english: Mr. Gündoğdu's anger has clearly shaken you deeply.

text: Git kendini topla, öyle gel kilimhaneye.
english: Go and compose yourself, then come to the carpet workshop.
This is from the Kayı tribe, this is from the Kayı tribe.
(Selcan) Get out of the way! Get out of the way .
(Selcan) Get out of the way! Leave the man alone. Don't
get up, my brave one. You're injured.

text: Bana Gündoğdu Bey’i bulun. Diyeceklerim var.
english: Find me Mr. Gündoğdu. I have something to say. Ok

text: Ne bakarsınız? Koşun yardım çağırın, hadi.
english: What are you looking at? Run, call for help, hurry!
(Rabarba) Let's inform Mr. Artuk. Allow me

text: Açılın ahali. Açılın hele biraz. Nefes alsın.
english: Move aside, everyone. Move aside a little. Let him breathe.

text: Kargın’la birlikte on bir Alp alıp gitti.
english: took eleven Alps with him and left.
Where did Günkut go? Where did he go?
They went to Noyan, sir. They

text: Hamza bu kadarını da yapmış olamaz.
english: Hamza couldn't have done something like this.
You brought this trouble upon us, Gündoğdu. Ehh

text: Kocabaş, atları hazırla. Hainlerin peşinden gideceğiz.
english: Kocabaş, get the horses ready. We will go after the traitors.
Oh God, in the name of God.
What's wrong, brother, being so rude?

text: Tuğtekin doğru söylemiş. Hamza hain çıktı.
english: Tugtekin was right. Hamza turned out to be a traitor.
It's likely that Abdurrahman feels the same way.
Hamza, having joined forces with Kargin,

text: …on bir Kayı Alpini de yanına alıp, Noyan’ın safına geçmiş.
english: ...and taking eleven Kayi Alps with him, defected to Noyan's side.

text: İhanete karşı koymaya çalışan bir Kayı Alpini de ağır yaralamış.
english: A Kayı Alpine warrior who tried to resist the betrayal was also seriously wounded. You vile
more to come, Hayme. It turns out the

text: Kayı Obası içten çürümüş meğer de haberimiz olmamış.
english: Kayı tribe was rotten from within, and we did n't even know it.

text: Bu ihanetin arkasının gelmesine mani olmalısın.
english: You must prevent this betrayal from happening again. And right now

text: Suçunu itiraf ederse işini hemen bitir.
english: finish him off immediately. If he doesn't

text: …o zaman ibreti âlem için ağır ağır al canını.
english: then take his life slowly, as a lesson to all.

text: Obada biz yokken bir hâller olmuş.
english: Something happened in Obada while we were away.
Hamza turned out to be a traitor.
He took twelve Alpi to Noyan. Damn scoundrel

text: Onun yüzünden Abdurrahman’ı da hain bellediler.
english: Because of him, they also branded Abdurrahman a traitor.

text: İdam etmek isterler. Şimdi toyda onu konuşurlar.
english: They want to execute him. Now they'll be talking about it at the wedding. Goo

text: Bu işin sonunda hiç hayır görmem.
english: I won't see any good come of this in the end.
You weren't late in taking precautions, sir.
You still have a chance. Where did this idea of

text: Toya böyle destursuz girmek de nereden çıktı Ertuğrul?
english: barging into the toy so uninvited come from, Ertuğrul? Where did the idea of

text: Adalet ararken intikam almak nereden çıktı dayı?
english: revenge come from when seeking justice, uncle? Is it in accordance with Oghuz tradition to make

text: İhanetin bedelini yiğit bir Alpe ödetmek Oğuz töresine sığar mı?
english: a valiant warrior pay the price for betrayal ?
We're discussing what we're going to do here.

text: Henüz bir şeye karar verilmiş değil.

english: The men will pay for their anger , mother.

text: Bir kurban isterler. Kurban da Abdurrahman olacak.
english: They want a victim. Abdurrahman will be the sacrificial animal. I won't allow that

text: Bunlar hep senin inadın yüzünden oldu.
english: This is all because of your stubbornness. And

text: Şimdi de kalkmış bize ahkâm kesiyorsun.
english: now you're trying to lecture us?

text: Sen geldikten sonra Alpler ne yapacağını…
english: Since you arrived, the Alps haven't known what to do...

text: …ne edeceğini, kimden emir alacağını bilemez oldular.
english: what to say, or from whom to take orders.
Now they have turned their backs on their masters and
... joined the enemy ranks. I told you

text: Noyan’ın bütün kış yatıp, ordusunun gelmesini beklemeyeceğini söyledim size.
english: Noyan wouldn't just sit around all winter waiting for his army to arrive.
You didn't listen to me. While
you sit here with your heads buried…
Noyan has already started the war.
come near me, Ertuğrul. I won't show

text: Senin de gözünün yaşına bakmam. Bilesin.
english: you any mercy either. Just so you know.
Thanks to you, the peace of our villages has been disturbed. Don't get in our way
Stop now, Ertuğrul Bey. Enough. It's a
pity for both your mother and your brother.

text: Dayının dilinden düşmezdin. Yere göğe sığdıramazdı seni.
english: Your uncle always talked about you. He couldn't praise you enough. Her eyes would light up
when he mentioned her name . He could

text: Uyku uyumaz oldu. Yediği lokmayı bilmez oldu.
english: n't sleep anymore. He no longer knew what he was eating.

text: Artık yeter. Dodurga ikilik nedir bilmezdi.
english: That's enough. Dodurga did not know what duality was.

text: Ta ki sen mezarından çıkıp gelene kadar.
english: Until you rise from your grave. Enough is enough

text: Yeter artık. İnadı bırak. Beylerine itaat et.
english: . Stop being stubborn. Obey your masters.

text: Senin gibi bir yiğide de bu yakışır.
english: This is befitting of a brave man like you.

text: Hep inat, hep inat. Değil mi?
english: Always stubborn, always stubborn. Isn't it ?
Where did they go, auntie? To

text: Korkut Bey’in kesin emri var Ertuğrul Bey’im. Çadıra giremezsin.
english: Mr. Korkut has given a strict order, Mr. Ertuğrul. You can't enter the tent.
you out of here, Abdurrahman. Get

text: Masum olduğumu ispatlamadan ölmeme izin verme beyim.
english: die before I can prove my innocence, sir. Do

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im. Bize yapmak istemediğimiz şeyleri yaptırtma.
english: My name is Ertuğrul Bey. Don't force us to do things we don't want to do.
Sir, we'd like to come too.
You stay here. I hope nothing bad happens to

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im, bilmeni istediğim bir şey var.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, there's something I want you to know.
I will listen to you, Halime Sultan.

text: Anan da ağabeyin gibi sana kırgın. Hatta belki öfkeli.
english: Your mother is upset with you, just like your brother. Perhaps even angry.

text: Lakin bilesin ki ikisinin de içi yanmaktadır.
english: But know this: they are both burning with pain inside.

text: Benim onlara karşı bir kırgınlığım yoktur.
english: I bear no ill will towards them. They
do what they believe is right. Ertuğrul, you and

text: Turgut ve Doğan'la birlikte seni sürgün etmeyi bile düşünürler Ertuğrul.
english: Turgut and Doğan might even consider exiling you. That's what I

text: Ben de bunu isterim Halime Sultan.

english: hands and feet are tied in this encampment.

text: Herkes er ya da geç gerçeği görecek.
english: Everyone will see the truth sooner or later.
So what is my role, sir?
It is about waiting patiently, Halime Sultan.

text: Beylerim. Toyumuz, Abdurrahman Alp hakkında karar verecektir.
english: Gentlemen. Our council will decide on Abdurrahman Alp. Does anyone have anything to
You are doing it wrong. It's this young, inexperienced fool,

text: Yanlışı, doğruyu bu toy belirleyecek Deli Demir.
english: Deli Demir, who will determine right and wrong. The
truth is as clear as day.
No act of treason goes unpunished. Those who accepted

text: Kayı beylerinin uygun gördüğü bir günde…
english: On a day deemed appropriate by the Kayı chieftains…
They might have set a trap.

text: Kocabaş, sen aşağıya in. Alplere söyle, tepelerden gelsinler.
english: Kocabaş, you come down. Tell the Alps to come down from the hills. -They
shouldn't lose eye contact either. -Yes sir. Let
Ertuğrul Bey. I wasn't expecting you.
How could you betray Obana, Hamza?

text: Birilerinin Gündoğdu Bey’in yaptığı aptallıklara son vermesi gerekti.
english: Someone needed to put an end to the foolishness that Mr. Gündoğdu was committing.

text: Lakin sen de boyun eğmek yerine…

english: Noyan won't stop until he kills you.

text: Noyan iti hangi kemiği önüne attı da obanı sattın?
english: What bone did that dog Noyan throw in front of you that you betrayed your tribe?

text: Ben kardeşin Gündoğdu gibi önüne atılan kemiğe tav olmam Ertuğrul.
english: like your brother Gündoğdu, I won't be fooled by a bone thrown in front of me, Ertuğrul.
My weapon will not be sheathed until the traitors are dead.
I know your hand is injured, Ertuğrul.
Take down this vicious monster that's attacking your brain.

text: İndirin dedim size şu adamı. İndirin!
english: told you to take that man down. Download it!
I am the new bey of the tribe, Ertuğrul. From
now on, you will pledge allegiance to me.
